mapper.insert: insert into assemble_location_info (id, city_id, address, remark, create_time, update_time, is_deleted) values (#{id}, #{cityId}, #{address}, #{remark}, now(), now(), 0)
mapper.update:
update assemble_location_info
city_id = #{cityId},
address = #{address},
remark = #{remark},
update_time = now()
where id = #{id}
mapper.select: select ci.city_name as cityName, ali.* from assemble_location_info ali inner join city_info ci on ali.city_id = ci.id where ali.is_deleted = 0
